dict.string:
#!/usr/bin/env ruby require 'rexml/document'
def serialize(source, dest) if source.is_a? REXML::Text dest.add_text(source.dup) return dest end
d2 = dest.add_element('xsl:element', 'name' => source.expanded_name) source.attributes.each { |(k,v)| d2.add_element('xsl:attribute', 'name' => k).text = v } source.children.each { |node| serialize(node, d2)} dest end
source = REXML::Document.new(STDIN.read) dest = REXML::Document.new
print serialize(source.elements[1], dest).to_s
